alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:50AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN RIPLEY, SOUTHERN DEARBORN AND NORTHERN SWITZERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 AM EDT... At 1050 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Versailles, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Wilmington, Pleasant, Manchester, French, Hartford, Fairview, Mount Sinai, Aberdeen, Rexville, Pate, Cold Springs, Benham, Avonburg, Farmers Retreat, Bear Branch, Friendship and East Enterprise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
